description: Defines a Flutter widget `EventListItem` that displays an event with color indicator, title, time range, and supports swipe-to-delete functionality.

classes.name: EventListItem
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a list item for an event, including delete functionality and visual indicators.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the event list item, including swipe-to-delete, color indicators, and event details.
